title: England v Scotland: Women’s Rugby World Cup 2025 quarter-final – live
summary: Niall McVeigh provides a minute-by-minute report on the intense match between the hosts and Scotland as they compete for a spot in the semi-finals. Tensions run high as both teams vie for victory. Live updates will keep fans informed on the unfolding action.

title: England v South Africa: third men’s T20 international delayed by rain – live
summary: James Wallace provides live updates from the final match of the series at Trent Bridge. Fans can follow his over-by-over report for the latest developments. The game promises excitement as the series concludes.

title: Russian drone incursion into Poland ‘was Kremlin test on Nato’
summary: A Polish minister indicated that Moscow is trying to assess international reactions without initiating warfare. This statement comes as Romania reports a new incursion, likely tied to ongoing tensions in the region. The situation highlights escalating concerns over security and regional stability.

title: Manchester City v Manchester United: Premier League – live
summary: In the first Manchester derby of the season, anticipation builds as fans hope to see which team, Manchester City or Manchester United, will secure victory. Rob Smyth offers insights and analysis leading up to the match. Stay tuned for the outcome of this highly competitive clash.

title: Burnley 0-1 Liverpool: Premier League – as it happened
summary: Mohamed Salah missed a crucial penalty after Hannibal's injury-time handball gave Burnley a chance to equalize. This setback prevented Salah from contributing to a potential victory for his team. The match ended in disappointment as Burnley managed to hold their ground.
